channel.title: Noam Chomsky on Patrick C. Trettenbrein
channel.description: Recent content in Noam Chomsky on Patrick C. Trettenbrein

item.title: 50 years later: A conversation about the biological study of language with Noam Chomsky
item.description: An interview with Noam Chomsky, a co-founder of the field of biolinguistics, contemporary, and friend of Eric Lenneberg where he talks about the early days of the field, his work and relation with Lenneberg, and a number of other questions and scientific issues that (still) captivate us 50 years later.
